Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham scored a dramatic overhead kick in stoppage time to equalize for England.
Harry Kane scored the winning goal in extra time with a header from an Ivan Toney assist.
Ivan Schranz scored for Slovakia midway through the first half.
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate praised Jude Bellingham for his game-changing moment.
Southgate will bring up his 100th game as England’s manager when his side faces Switzerland in the quarter-finals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Marc Guéhi will be suspended for the next match against Switzerland due to receiving his second yellow card of the tournament.
England fans celebrated wildly after the goals against Slovakia.
